channel.title: EasyRSC How do I add in "Sell X"
channel.description:
Looking through mudclient.java (Which I assumed is where I should be looking, correct me if I'm wrong), I could not find out where it handles the click of the mouse for the button let alone where it sends the data telling the server how many items the user wants to sell. Could someone please help explain to me how I would add in a "Sell X" feature? I don't want a pre-made file I want to know how it's done, thanks :).
(If a premade file is all you can provide please tell me where you made the changes)

item.title: EasyRSC How do I add in "Sell X"
item.dc:creator: @TheGuyWhoGotOn TheGuyWhoGotOn
item.description:
@TheGuyWhoGotOn wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:3, topic:319699”][quote author=TheGuyWhoGotOn link=topic=416161.msg3061355#msg3061355 date=1260882167]
Lol okay I’ll figure it out myself :P. It’s possible, I know that much so I don’t want my users to need a bot.
[/quote]

No, you misunderstood what I meant. Download a bot source code to see how they have done it. I was never into bot programming to have learnt client modification but it will be easy enough.[/quote]

Well I would assume that a bot would simulate the “click here to sell” X amount of times. But yes, I guess it could help me out, thanks for the suggestion I appreciate it, rep++ (Edit: NVM I need 15 rep points to do that).

Edit: And bot programming…All I’ve done is SCAR and I wrote a bit of a Java bot for RS2 then quit. Too bat there are little similarities stupid messy client, I think I’ll try to document it.

Read full topic
item.source: EasyRSC How do I add in "Sell X"
